A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The best Star Wars movie\, better than The Force Awakens. I say go check it out! There was a lot more humor than usual\, which I found very nice and the tension in seeing it the first time was epic. There were amazing action sequences that Lucasfilm accomplished very amazingly. I just hope they do the same for Leia in Episode IX\, considering her unexpected death. What I see in the movie is balance. There is balance with Rey and Kylo Ren\, there's balance with the Force\, the light and the dark. It is accomplished very well. So like I said before\, go check it out. You will not be disappointed.
